articles.title: Amazing Glove Is Life Changing For Those With Parkinson's - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Roberta Wilson-Garrett looked at the glove keeping her right hand steady and smiled.
articles.content:

At bay for the moment were tremors caused by Parkinson's disease affecting her muscle control.
